reviewText: this is the best I have seen. I tend to agree with his research. Definitely makes the most sense to me

A classic case of deciding first, then setting about to prove it - which to my mind is clearly the backward version of science. In short, I would not recommend this DVD to anyone with a serious interest in such investigations.

I FIND THESE PURCHASES SOMEWHAT HELPFUL AND INTERESTING TO ME. I AM A HISTORY NUT AND I DO
ENJOY ARTICLES SUCH AS THIS.

Only for the purists and must have it all of Ripper things.  Not a bad made film, a bit full of itself, did pretty good - up to the point where they go on then, to FIND him and relate the big climax, to a little "Tweet" rated and brief statement of why they think he is, who they think he is.  Lots of build up, revelation fell flat, barely supported, and looked like they spent 10% of their actual budget, on anything past, the last classic Ripper agreed upon event - maybe worth a rental?
